title: anyone recomend a good insurance co

posts.content:
as the ad says, i was insured by hearts and just phoned up to change my insurence from a 53 oval to a 62 splitty only to be told by a young girl that she did not know what one of these was so after giving her a history lesson she put me on hold for what seemed like ages only to come back and tell me that its not a classic car and that they can not insure it, but if i wanted to i could get a quote from her for a motor home, i wont bore you all with what followed as much to say i cancealed my insurance with them

please help any good insurers for my bus?

A few threads on this you can search but RH comes out top for most people. Only do agreed value if it's garaged and won't insure if it's parked on the road but other than that pretty universally good.

Haggerty, are very good, they only insure classic cars, but you have to be. 30 years or older.
It also allows you to drive any friends classics if insured with them as well fully comp.
Good luck
